<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<E> it = x.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
i = i + 1;

<<<explanation>>>: You're trying to use the Iterator to iterate through the elements of the X class, but the Iterator is not designed to work with the X class. Instead, you should use the next() method of the Iterator to get the next element of the X class.
